PSG star Edinson Cavani wants to join Manchester City after Neymar row despite interest from Real Madrid


Edinson Cavani wants to leave PSG and join Manchester City after falling out with team-mate Neymar, according to a report in Spain.
Don Balon claim that the Uruguayan is keen to sign for Pep Guardiola's side because he believes he will get more chances to score than at any other club.
Cavani and Neymar had a public falling out after arguing over penalty and free-kick duties during a 2-0 victory over Lyon earlier this season.
